verses.verse: The words <WH1697> of Jeremiah <WH3414> the son <WH1121> of Hilkiah <WH2518>, of the priests <WH3548> that were in Anathoth <WH6068> in the land <WH776> of Benjamin <WH1144>:

To whom the word <WH1697> of the Lord <WH3068> came in the days <WH3117> of Josiah <WH2977> the son <WH1121> of Amon <WH526> king <WH4428> of Judah <WH3063>, in the thirteenth <WH7969> year <WH8141> of his reign <WH4427>.

It came also in the days <WH3117> of Jehoiakim <WH3079> the son <WH1121> of Josiah <WH2977> king <WH4428> of Judah <WH3063>, unto the end <WH8552> of the eleventh <WH6249> year <WH8141> of Zedekiah <WH6667> the son <WH1121> of Josiah <WH2977> king <WH4428> of Judah <WH3063>, unto the carrying away <WH1540> of Jerusalem <WH3389> captive <WH1540> in the fifth <WH2549> month <WH2320>.
Then the word <WH1697> of the Lord <WH3068> came unto me <WH559>, saying,

Before <WH2962> I formed <WH3335> you in the belly <WH990> I knew <WH3045> you <WH3318>; and before you came forth out of the womb <WH7358> I sanctified <WH6942> you <WH5414>, and I ordained you a prophet <WH5030> unto the nations <WH1471>.
Then said <WH559> I <WH162>, Ah, Lord <WH136> God <WH3069>! behold <WH3045>, I cannot speak <WH1696>: for I am a child <WH5288>.

But the Lord <WH3068> said <WH559> unto me <WH559>, Say not <WH5288>, I am a child: for you shall go <WH3212> to all that I shall send <WH7971> you <WH6680>, and whatever I command you you shall speak <WH1696>.
Be not afraid <WH3372> of their faces <WH6440>: for I am with you to deliver <WH5337> you <WH5002>, says the Lord <WH3068>.

Then the Lord <WH3068> put forth <WH7971> his hand <WH3027>, and touched <WH5060> my mouth <WH6310>. And the Lord <WH3068> said <WH559> unto me <WH5414>, Behold, I have put my words <WH1697> in your mouth <WH6310>.

See <WH7200>, I have this day <WH3117> set <WH6485> you over the nations <WH1471> and over the kingdoms <WH4467>, to root out <WH5428>, and to pull down <WH5422>, and to destroy <WH6>, and to throw down <WH2040>, to build <WH1129>, and to plant <WH5193>.
Moreover the word <WH1697> of the Lord <WH3068> came unto me <WH559>, saying, Jeremiah <WH3414>, what see <WH7200> you <WH559>? And I said, I see <WH7200> a rod <WH4731> of a almond tree <WH8247>.
Then said <WH559> the Lord <WH3068> unto me <WH3190>, You have well seen <WH7200>: for I will hasten <WH8245> my word <WH1697> to perform it <WH6213>.

And the word <WH1697> of the Lord <WH3068> came unto me the second time <WH8145>, saying <WH559>, What see <WH7200> you <WH559>? And I said, I see <WH7200> a seething <WH5301> pot <WH5518>; and the face <WH6440> there is toward <WH6440> the north <WH6828>.
Then the Lord <WH3068> said <WH559> unto me <WH6828>, Out of the north a evil <WH7451> shall break forth <WH6605> upon all the inhabitants <WH3427> of the land <WH776>.

For <WH7121>, behold, I will call all the families <WH4940> of the kingdoms <WH4467> of the north <WH6828>, says <WH5002> the Lord <WH3068>; and they shall come <WH935>, and they shall set <WH5414> every one <WH376> his throne <WH3678> at the entering <WH6607> of the gates <WH8179> of Jerusalem <WH3389>, and against all the walls <WH2346> there round about <WH5439>, and against all the cities <WH5892> of Judah <WH3063>.

And I will utter <WH1696> my judgments <WH4941> against them touching <WH5921> all their wickedness <WH7451>, who have forsaken <WH5800> me <WH6999>, and have burned incense unto other <WH312> gods <WH430>, and worshiped <WH7812> the works <WH4639> of their own hands <WH3027>.

You therefore clothe up <WH247> your body <WH4975>, and arise <WH6965>, and speak <WH1696> unto them all that I command <WH6680> you <WH2865>: be not dismayed at their faces <WH6440>, lest I confound <WH2865> you before them <WH6440>.

For <WH589>, behold, I have made <WH5414> you this day <WH3117> a fortified <WH4013> city <WH5892>, and a iron <WH1270> pillar <WH5982>, and bronze <WH5178> walls <WH2346> against the whole land <WH776>, against the kings <WH4428> of Judah <WH3063>, against the princes <WH8269> there <WH3548>, against the priests there <WH5971>, and against the people of the land <WH776>.
And they shall fight <WH3898> against you <WH3201>; but they shall not prevail against you <WH5002>; for I am with you, says the Lord <WH3068>, to deliver you <WH5337>.
